thread.section_title: MicksGarage.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MicksGarage.com | www.micksgarage.com
thread.title: Michael Breegan

author: Michael Breegan
title: Michael Breegan
text:
I only discovered micks garage a few weeks ago and am I glad I did. I bought my 2012 prius three weeks ago and I wanted to give it an oil service, looked up micks garage for oil and filter and I could not find a better price anywhere.Then I wanted new mats as you do when you buy a new car, again micks garage came up trumps, (not donald). So to finish off my new car look I wanted front door wind deflectors and again micks garage was the best price. But to me it's not all about price, service is just as important. I collected my parts @ the main depot and met Colin on the sales desk, lovely fellow and and a wealth of knowledge.He even helped me fit fit the deflectors when he got a few minutes. To sum up, I will definitely be going back to micks garage.
Michael.
